The goal of EDIutils is to provide an API Client for the Environmental Data Initiative Repository ... The EDI data repository (https://portal.edirepository.org/nis/home.jsp) is for the archive and reuse of ecological data, emphasizing data quality and information rich metadata. EDIutils includes functions to search the repository, retrieve metadata, download files, and more.

* [Publish Data]()
